title: Tollen Encounters
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship navigates Tollen's secrets and allies
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship flies north from Uzgukhar to destroy the Scepter of Command, covering vast distances.
They encounter hazardous black mold in the ruins of Isingue, which is repelled by Wellby.
Arriving in Tollen, they negotiate safe harbor and split up to pursue various interests across the city.
Wellby reconnects with mapmaker Guy Marchand, Delwath shops for skyship needs and gathers local rumors, Kenzo seeks out a magical tattoo.
All members reconvene and exchange information at The Windward Sail, making local connections.
The party meets Melindir, learning about Orenlas and a potential quest from the Skaer.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship engages with the bustling city of Tollen, rekindling old acquaintances and discovering new leads in their quest.
